book.title: Welcome To Imageview 6
book.content:
Welcome to Imageview 6
Imageview 6 is an easy to use Photo Album manager.
If you get lost using Imageview, have a look at the user manual located in the panel on the left.
The administrator's manual & skinning guide are located on the left as well.
Special Thanks
I would like to thank a few people who have helped me with the development of Imageview 6.
  • jXMLHttpRequest.js
    • Jeremy McPeak
    • Erik Arvidsson
  • Testers
    • Threeten
    • Jürgen Pulkrab
    • Martine Tysmans
Change Log
  • February 2009
    • 20090225 Release 6.2.1
    • 20090225 Fixed with cache on images are now forced refreshed to bypass browser cache
    • 20090225 Update switched to ExtendedPreFetch (much faster!)
    • 20090225 Fixed admin not loading when using tree mode
    • 20090225 Fixed broken album tree
    • 20090225 Update removed duplicate code in albumtree.php
  • January 2009
    • 20090109 Update no album preloading if loaded in the last 5 min, most likely still in cache
    • 20090109 Added skip preload when click on dialog
    • 20090109 Fixed album change before prelaod finished problems
    • 20090108 Draft implemtation of album prelaoder
    • 20090108 Update use preload options for images
    • 20090108 Update preloaded to use new options
    • 20090108 Update interface, albums and images have seperate prelaod option
    • 20090107 Release 6.2.0
    • 20090107 Update enabled more accurate preloader
    • 20090106 Fixed enabled soft_error in imgproc.php, should fix missing images when annotating
    • 20090106 Update soft_error flag to jImageProccessor.php
  • December 2008
    • 20081214 Fixed installer bugs
    • 20081214 Tweakes for Firefox 3
    • 20081212 Faster imageview.js decoding
  • September 2007
    • 20070923 Update locked albums are now marked in album manager/li>
    • 20070923 Update help icon updated for Leaf, Orange, Cherry, Water and Graphite templates
    • 20070923 Added clicking on text next to the checkbox works
    • 20070923 Fixed oPostData undefined error in IE7
    • 20070903 Release 6.1.0
    • 20070903 Create New Skin: Cherry
    • 20070903 Create New Skin: Graphite
    • 20070903 Create New Skin: Water
    • 20070903 Updated and rename Professional skin to Leaf
    • 20070902 Create New Skin: Orange
  • August 2007
    • 20070829 Release 6.0.7
    • 20070829 Fixed cancel upload in IE6/7
    • 20070829 Fixed cache not being update inside admin
    • 20070829 Password checking now done in imageview.js
    • 20070828 Included unpack.php in install folder (for the odd server configurations)
  • July 2007
    • 20070630 Release 6.0.6
    • 20070703 Fixed broken imageprocessor
    • 20070703 Fixed broken search engine page
    • 20070703 Fixed broken rss feed
    • 20070703 Implemented new cache manager
    • 20070703 Added maxlength to color field in settings
    • 20070703 Fixed removal of serial key when updating/adding users
    • 20070701 Fixed reload album when admin login visible
  • June 2007
    • 20070630 Release 6.0.5
    • 20070630 Fixed cache bug in IE and Opera
    • 20070630 Fixed dblclick no longer generated a usable link
    • 20070630 Added link hash gets removed after usage
    • 20070630 Fixed some javascript syntax errors
    • 20070630 Update Installer
    • 20070630 Added import license.key
    • 20070630 Moved License Key to config.xml
    • 20070629 Fixed history error due to validation
    • 20070629 Fixed configuration reload
    • 20070629 URL generated is now hash
    • 20070627 Release 6.0.4
    • 20070627 Minor code cleanups
    • 20070627 Updated login dialog to fit in with the rest of imageview
    • 20070627 Added better security to new authentication system
  • May 2007
    • 20070530 Release 6.0.3
    • 20070530 Fixed authentication system, now works with CGI php aswel
    • 20070530 Fixed minor bugs and annoyances
    • 20070530 Added registration field to troubleshooting
    • 20070506 Release 6.0.2
    • 20070506 Implemented Search Engine friendly version
    • 20070506 Fixed bug where license file wasn't detected correctly
    • 20070505 Release 6.0.1
    • 20070505 Fixed IE doesn't display auth form (found: Michael Elbert)
    • 20070505 Fixed bug when using php 4 (found: Michael Elbert)
  • April 2007
    • 20070429 D-Day Release 6.0
    • 20070428 Fixed bug where album name couldn't contain an &
    • 20070428 Fixed installer encoding selection bug
    • 20070428 Fixed error when invaldi album was loaded
    • 20070428 Fixed bug in rss encoding of filenames
    • 20070428 Tagged RC2
    • 20070425 Security Fix now strips html from user description & label's
    • 20070424 Fix bug in init_skin() due to new init procedure
    • 20070423 Fix bug in transparent PNG IE6
    • 20070422 Code Optimization Init function
    • 200704XX Create of Install System
    • 20070404 Small celebration - The work is done!
    • 20070404 Finished the admin documentation
    • 20070404 Update documentation index with expanded admin subjects
    • 20070404 Finished user management section for admin documentation
    • 20070403 Finished user documentation
    • 20070402 Fixed user upload for strange characters
    • 20070402 Fixed rss output for strange characters
    • 20070402 Minor fixes for Internet Explorer 7 compatibility
    • 20070402 Minor fixes for Safari compatibility
    • 20070402 Minor fixes for Opera compatibility
    • 20070402 Fixed quote bug in image manager
    • 20070401 Fixed color conversion bug when using imagemagick
    • 20070401 Fixed first thumbnails missing when using imagemagick
    • 20070401 Added reload after user image upload
    • 20070401 Fixed encodeURI/escape URI platform problem
    • 20070401 Fixed preload failed when default album was empty
    • 20070401 Implemented support for extended characters in filesand album names
    • 20070401 Fixed label name wasn't truncated when uploading
    • 20070401 Implemented easterbunny for extra protection of your images
    • 20070401 Added support for more characters in description field for image and albums
  • March 2007
    • 20070331 Fixed problem where image descriptions containing html got corrupted
    • 20070330 Fixed security hole where that allowed of user upload to all albums
    • 20070330 Implemented User Upload System
    • 20070330 Fixed user upload icon not displaying for empty albums
    • 20070330 Fixed cancel upload wouln't work inside the uploader in the admin interface
    • 20070330 Fixed Safari upload bug
    • 20070330 Fixed accepted image formats. IE sends image/pjpeg for some reason
    • 20070329 Cleanup of uploader in the admin interface
    • 20070329 Fixed user access limit bug after login where user got admin powers
    • 20070329 Fixed bug where thumbnail width/height could be set below 50
    • 20070329 Updated troubleshooting with rebuild thumbnail function
    • 20070329 Fixed row not displaying if description was empty
    • 20070329 Implemented image uploader in the admin interface
    • 20070323 Implemented user access controle for admin and user accounts
    • 20070318 Implemented usage of html code in album/image description
    • 20070318 Finished edit dialog
    • 20070317 Implemented information fetch edit dialog
    • 20070317 Create basic layout edit dialog
    • 20070317 Truncate long descriptions
    • 20070317 2nd part of remove image complete
    • 20070313 Fixed new line bug when updating config file
    • 20070311 Completed first part of remove image
    • 20070311 Fixed bug where cache of album wasn't remove
    • 20070310 Fixed bug where IE lost the head style
    • 20070310 Create layout for Image manager
  • February 2007
    • 20070220 Fixed Album image flicker when using protected images
    • 20070207 Fixed Update bug - empty albums nolonger get ghost image
  • January 2007
    • 20070115 Fixed Description bug - You can now use special characters
    • 20070109 Fixed Album Name bug
    • 20070108 Fixed bug where empty album crashed Imageview
    • 20070107 Fixed bug in album manager - always createalbum()
  • December 2006
    • 20061222 Fixed description bug in admin
    • 20061221 Fixed loadform displayed when not needed
    • 20061221 Fixed filename space bug
    • 20061221 Finished album manager layout
    • 20061220 Finished Remove Album Function
    • 20061220 Finished Album Manger Interface
    • 20061220 Finished AlbumObject Class
    • 20061219 Added redirects for album folders
    • 20061219 Fixed Recursive chmod on linux
    • 20061218 Added Throubleshooting page
    • 20061218 Fixed x.gif error logging problem
  • October 2006
    • 20061029 Fixed minor mistakes in documentation
    • 20061029 Auto-Update user list fixed
    • 20061029 Finished Delete User function
    • 20061028 Finished Update User function
    • 20061028 Finished Create User function
    • 20061027 Created layout for users page
    • 20061017 Finished settings page
    • 20061017 Fixed bug in admincfg.php
    • 20061016 Fixed minor error in Dark Emotion
    • 20061016 Finished layout of settings page
    • 20061007 Started the Admin inferface
  • September 2006
    • 20060903 Implemented jXCoreModule - Events
    • 20060901 Removed Messy Keybind event code
  • August 2006
    • 20060826 Updated Image Protection - New suports IE6 & Safari
    • 20060826 Fixed Internal Windows System bug in IE6
    • 20060825 Added Internal Window System
    • 20060825 Moved away from popup window for documentation
    • 20060825 Fixed ontop bug in help window
    • 20060825 Optimized internal storage of data (hopefully allow for special characters)
    • 20060825 Fixed bug in Authentication code
    • 20060823 Reverted back to the old preloaded - New one is too slow in a RWE
    • 20060823 Added Image Protection - User can't right-click->save the image
    • 20060821 Fixed bugs in LoadImage - Couldn't load image from locked album
    • 20060821 Updated Dark Emotion to be compatible with Internet Explorer 6
    • 20060817 Optimized xhtml generation procedure
    • 20060817 Fixed bugs in new xhtml generation procedure
    • 20060816 Addded Dark Emotion skin
    • 20060816 Rewrote LoadImage to extend skinning support
    • 20060815 Rewrote LoadAlbum to extend skinning support
    • 20060813 Added Preload configuration: none, interface, all
    • 20060813 Updated Preloaded so the list is created dynamicaly
    • 20060813 Updated Preloaded so it shows file + download progress
    • 20060813 Updated skin.xml, now has parameter for preload progressbar color
    • 20060812 Updated Preloader to show download progress instead of file
  • July 2006
    • 20060728 Fix problems with spaces in filename. (hopefully)
    • 20060722 Rewrote code generation to use jXCore.SuperString
    • 20060722 Added support for media attribute in skin.xml
    • 20060716 Fixed Safari Navigation Keys
    • 20060716 Updated Preload detector
    • 20060716 Update HistoryRecorder: iframe -> frame
    • 20060707 Implemented jXCore into Imageview.js
    • 20060707 Finished rewrite, jXCore framework is created
    • 20060706 Started complete rewrite of my scripts optimized for speed & file size
  • June 2006
    • 20060628 Change keyboard image navigation keys to left & right
    • 20060622 Added keyboard image navigation (+/- keys)
    • 20060622 Added Extended Reference Book to Documentation System
    • 20060621 Added Basic Framework Book to the Documentation System
    • 20060621 Fixed Documentation System - Bug in IE6, wouldn't load books
    • 20060620 Implementation of Documentation System (Framework & Welcome book)
    • 20060619 Optimization of image files ± 16% decrease in size
  • April 2006
    • History works again in Firefox and Internet Explorer
    • Creation of Professional Skin - Dynamic Interface
    • Updated pngfix.js and switched to better browser handling
    • Rewrite of Classic Skin - to make it compatible with the new system
  • March 2006
    • Extended Skinning support - to allow more flexibility that is needed to finish the client side
    • Optimization of oImageview Core - jXMLHttpRequest Implementation & Other varied fixes
    • Creation of jXMLHttpRequest.js - Optimized and updated rewrite of xmlhttp.js (Opera, IE7 and Safari Compatibility)
    • Implementation of Pre loading
  • Late 2005 - April 2006
    • Classic Skin - First working version (User side only, Limited functionality)
    • Debug Skin - Simple skin for debugging the Imageview Core (won't be included)
    • xmlhttp.js, jBrowser.js, jPreload.js - Javascript Classes for xml Parsing, Browser Detection and Pre loading
    • oImageview Core (javascript)
    • PHP Core

book.title: Using Imageview 6
book.content:
Introduction
I'll try to explain how to use Imageview 6 from a user perspective.
This manual page will come in sections so you can skip to the section you want and skip the once you don't care about.
  • Requirements
  • Viewing Albums
  • Viewing Locked Albums
  • Browsing Images
  • Slideshows
  • RSS Feeds
  • Uploading Images
Requirements
  • Resolution
    • 1024x768 (recommended)
    • 800x600   (minimum - no admin)
  • Browser
    • Mozilla Firefox (recommended)
    • Internet Explorer 6 & 7
      • Microsoft XML Core Services (require when using IE 6)
    • Safari
    • Opera 8+
Viewing Albums
Imageview 6 has two ways of displaying a list of albums.
Which one you see depend on the template the administrator has selected.
  1. Dropdown:
  2. Tree view:
Simply click on the dropdown and select the album you want.
For the tree view the same applies, just click on the album you want.
Double clicking on the group icons will open them and show the containing albums.
Viewing Locked Album
Follow the same procedure as above.
In a dropdown locked albums are marked with a *. In a tree view the icon will have a lock over it.
Instead of seeing the thumbnails you will be greeted by an authentication dialog.

Fill in the password and click login. The thumbnails should now display.
The password will be cleared when the browser is closed. Checking the checkbox will prevent it from getting cleared.
Browsing Images
The images are displayed as thumbnails. Their size can vary depending on the admin's preferences.

Hovering over a thumbnail will highlight it as with the 2nd thumbnails in the screenshot above.
Clicking on a thumbnail will load the image in the original size.

When and image is loaded you can use the navigation icons to go to the next and previous images.
You can also return to the album by clicking the upwards pointing arrow.
 [Note: The appearance of the icons depend on the template the admin has selected.]
Would you like to show a particular image to a friend or relative?
You might have noticed that the URL in the address bar doesn't update. Double-Clicking the image will update the URL.
Slideshows
When viewing an album look for the navigation icons.
The number of icons depend on the admin's preferences.
 [Note: The appearance of the icons depend on the template the admin has selected.]
To start a slideshow click the left most icon. Not sure which icon to click? Hover your mouse over the icon!
A label should tell you what clicking the icon does.

The slideshow should start and display the first image.
The time it takes for the next image to appear depend on your download speed and the admin's preference.
You can start, stop and return to the album using the navigation icons.
 [Note: The appearance of the icons depend on the template the admin has selected.]
RSS Feeds
When viewing an album look for the navigation icons.
The number of icons depend on the admin's preferences.
 [Note: The appearance of the icons depend on the template the admin has selected.]
To open a RSS feed click on the right most icon. This icon might not always be available depending on the admin's preferences. Not sure which icon to click? Hover your mouse over the icon!
A label should tell you what clicking the icon does.
Uploading Images
When viewing an album look for the navigation icons.
The number of icons depends on the admin's preferences.
 [Note: The appearance of the icons depend on the template the admin has selected.]
To upload an image click the middle or right icon depending on the admin's preference. This icon is not always available.
Not sure which icon to click? Hover your mouse over the icon! A label should tell you what clicking the icon does.

A window will pop up so make sure your popup blocker isn't blocking it.
The name and description fields can be left blank.
If name is left blank the first 20 characters of the filename will be used.

book.title: License Information
book.content:
License Information
I'm still providing Imageview 6 freely like I did with the previous versions.
However experience has told me that asking nicely to put a link to my site in return almost never happened.
So I'd like to thank the few that did link back!

In the free version the first thumbnail will be a link to my site.
If you want to get rid of the link you can purchase a license. (see table).

License Expire Price
Personal 5 years 15 USD
Can be used on a personal website.
Commercial 10 years 35 USD
Can be used as part of a package for a customer or used to in other ways that give you profit.
Special 5 years free
Same as personal. - charity, promotional, in return for services someone gave me, …

If you are interested in a license you can request one here.
An invoice will be sent via paypal. Other arrangements on payment can be made.

Once the payment is complete I will send you a license file that needs to be placed inside the admin folder.
The next time you save your settings Imageview will import the license key,
inside the administrator go to General->Settings and press Save.

Attention: License keys are linked to a domain name and expiration date.
You can install Imageview multiple times on the same domain (not sub domains) until the key expires.
